about_the_game:
Rel.Pink makes sex-positive games that encourage all types of transgender identities (whether secret or public) and feminization kinks and fetishes. Don’t be afraid to say who you are – and live out your feminization fantasies.

Lead an alien bacterial race that induces male to female body transformations, one cell at a time. But as your hosts embrace their new bodies, the politicians close in… Femdemic is a witty, trans-affirming idle clicker with two story paths that explore gender, happiness, and femininity.

Liberation is a wholesome, trans-affirming story aimed at the Trans- and LGBTQIA2+-audience. Lead a benevolent mission to give each trans woman the body she needs. Increasing your hosts’ self-love is crucial to success. But beware politicians as they attempt to lock down this trans awakening …

Compliance is a feminization-fetish story for mature players aimed at the BSDSM-focused audience. Your alien bacterial race spreads to new hosts through sex, but there’s a catch - All natural-born Earth women are immune. The solution: Transform infected males into new females! Change each male host into a sexy female one - then encourage them to mate and spread the infection. Operation Feminize Earth has begun.

Features


  • Idle Clicker - Grow bacterial factories to infect your hosts
  • Male to Female transformations - Witness your hosts’ evolution in real time
  • Tactical Elements - Target specific areas of your host’s body and brain to enhance productivity - and fight against human interference
  • Strategic Upgrades - Choose carefully to increase productivity
  • 200+ outfits and accessories - Customize your increasingly feminine hosts
  • Hilarious dialogue - Enjoy astute alien commentary on what it means to be human.
  • Specializations - Unlock options for your host, ranging from Redhead to Bunny Girl
  • Two distinct story modes - Liberation Mode and Compliance Mode
    • Liberation Mode - Help trans women take their rightful place in society
    • Compliance Mode - Feminize every male on the planet

content_descriptors.notes: NSFW modes depict consensual sexual acts by adult characters. Characters in this mode can be viewed nude. All character art is 2D comic style. NSFW scenes are not the main focus of the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or newer, 64 bit support only
  • Processor: x86-64-compatible 1.4GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or newer, 64 bit support only
  • Processor: x86-64-compatible 1.4GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: 2,4Ghz Quad-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Plus Graphics 655
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: 2,4Ghz Quad-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Lead an alien bacterial race that induces male to female body transformations, one cell at a time. But as the women embrace their bodies, the politicians close in… Femdemic is a witty, trans-affirming idle clicker with two story paths that explore gender, happiness, and femininity.
